toast.title: All API Hub shielded bypass helper (temporary window)
toast.body:
This page was opened automatically by All API Hub to pass protection pages (e.g., Cloudflare challenges) and obtain the required cookies/session.

It’s necessary so All API Hub can make successful requests and detect data on protected sites.

If a verification step appears, complete it in this window; once passed, All API Hub continues and this window may close automatically.
